context: In 2010, Veeva was a young startup (founded 2007) building cloud CRM for pharmaceutical industry on Salesforce platform. The pharmaceutical CRM market was dominated by on-premises solutions from Cegedim and Siebel. IMS Health provided pharmaceutical data and analytics. Veeva differentiated with cloud-native, industry-specific CRM purpose-built for pharma sales teams. The company was growing rapidly as pharma companies sought modern alternatives to legacy systems.
